item.title: Debugging golang programs
item.description: I’ve been writing a lot of golang lately. I’ve hit painful problems in the past. Here are some debugging tips. Hopefully they help you out. I bet you don’t know #2. #0 Use log.Printf: This should go without saying, but I’m ashamed to say it’s what I use the most. We’ve only been C programming for 44+ years, and it’s still what is most useful! #1 Use go run -race:
